title: Have and Hold Me
description: I’m a dangerous man.I’m dangerous because I have nothing left to lose. Nothing to hold me back. Sandra Dane has left me, and now I’m a wild dog on the loose, ready to rip out the throats of the ones who tore us apart. I’ll punish my enemies, and the world will finally see exactly how far Charles Magister will go to stay on top. Even if it leaves me feeling hollow.The only thing that can make me whole is having Sandra back again. Until I look into her blue eyes and taste her delicious lips once more, I’ll be completely out of control. It’ll only take one push to tip me over the edge. And once I fall, I’ll do what I swore to myself I wouldn’t—chase my little fox down. Catch her once more. And never let her go again. **This is the conclusion of the four-book Magister series with a guaranteed HEA!**
author: July Hall
